thread.title: Football: Chelsea striker set to join Liverpool this summer
thread.title_full: Football: Chelsea striker set to join Liverpool this summer

title: Football: Chelsea striker set to join Liverpool this summer
text:
Antonio Conte has confirmed that Solanke is set to leave Chelsea 
Chelsea striker Dominic Solanke has been linked with a summer move to Liverpool. 
The 19-year-old's deal at Stamford Bridge expires at the end of this season and the Sun report that Antonio Conte has confirmed that he wants to leave Chelsea. 
The Sun exclusively reported yesterday that he told his friends that he will join the Reds. 
Due to Solanke's age, Liverpool will be forced to pay a tribunal - which could be as high as £8million - should the clubs not be able to agree a fee. 
This comes after the FA Youth Cup winner failed to agree a new deal with the Blues, with the teenager wanting £50,000-a-week.
